scripts.package: STAGE=${STAGE:-dev} && aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_bucketName --s3-prefix $npm_package_config_bucketName-${STAGE:-dev} --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.sam:deploy: STAGE=${STAGE:-dev} && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_config_stackName-${STAGE:-dev} --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $npm_package_config_region
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn build && yarn package && yarn sam:deploy
